alert.note: Alert for Crisp; Dodge; Montgomery; Telfair; Wheeler; Wilcox (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 21 at 10:02PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Dodge, Telfair, southeastern Wilcox, southeastern Wheeler, southeastern Crisp and south central Montgomery Counties through 1045 PM EDT... At 1002 PM EDT, a line of strong thunderstorms was along a line extending from near Double Run to Jordan, and moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Lumber City, Scotland, Jacksonville, Towns, Horse Creek Wma, Spring Hill, Temperance, Browning, China Hill, Double Run, Owensboro, Jordan and Workmore. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.

area.areaDesc: Crisp; Dodge; Montgomery; Telfair; Wheeler; Wilcox
